description: Combining mandarin, marmalade and almonds, these easy overnight oats can be prepared ahead of time and make for a zesty breakfast.
keywords: Oats,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Spring,Sesame free,Halal,Microwave,Sep 2020,Mandarin,Christmas,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Bitter Marmalade & Mandarin Overnight Oats Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place oats, milk and honey in a large airtight container or jar, mixing well to combine. Seal with lid. Refrigerate overnight to soak.
To make bitter marmalade & mandarin topping, place mandarins, marmalade and lemon juice in a saucepan and cook over medium heat for 3 minutes or until slightly thickened.

Spoon 1 1/2 cups oat mixture into a bowl. To serve warm, microwave oat mixture, stirring halfway, on high for 1 minute 15 seconds or until warmed through. Spoon over bitter marmalade and mandarin topping and serve sprinkled with almonds.
